name: Medical Health Care for Veterans
description: San Francisco VA Medical Center provides Veterans with a wide range of health, support, and facility services, including the following: - 24/7 Nurse Advise line - Geriatrics - Pharmacy - Specialty care (COVID-19 vaccines; HIV/AIDS; Laboratory and pathology; Nutrition, food, and dietary care; etc.) How to Apply: - Apply for VA health care. - Register for VA San Francisco health care by calling 415-750-2129, ext. 2-4066. - Schedule an appointment by either: - Online through VA login account - Call
fullDescription: San Francisco VA Medical Center provides Veterans with a wide range of health, support, and facility services, including the following: - 24/7 Nurse Advise line - Geriatrics - Pharmacy - Specialty care (COVID-19 vaccines; HIV/AIDS; Laboratory and pathology; Nutrition, food, and dietary care; etc.) How to Apply: - Apply for VA health care. - Register for VA San Francisco health care by calling 415-750-2129, ext. 2-4066. - Schedule an appointment by either: - Online through VA login account - Call
whatTheyOffer: San Francisco VA Medical Center provides Veterans with a wide range of health, support, and facility services, including the following: - 24/7 Nurse Advise line - Geriatrics - Pharmacy - Specialty care (COVID-19 vaccines; HIV/AIDS; Laboratory and pathology; Nutrition, food, and dietary care; etc.) How to Apply: - Apply for VA health care. - Register for VA San Francisco health care by calling 415-750-2129, ext. 2-4066. - Schedule an appointment by either: - Online through VA login account - Call
howToGetIt: - Apply for VA health care. - Register for VA San Francisco health care by calling 415-750-2129, ext. 2-4066. - Schedule an appointment by either: - Online through VA login account - Calling the Primary care call center at 877-487-2838, select 4. - For specialty care, your primary care provider's referral is needed to schedule an appointment until further notice.
agency: San Francisco VA Medical Center - Fort Miley
